title.rendered: Aaron Carter Calls Off One-Week Engagement

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Who had seven days in the Aaron Carter engagement pool?

A week after announcing his future marriage to former Playmate, Keri Ann Peniche, the young singer has called it off.

“It was a hasty thing to do and I am not ready for marriage quite yet,” Carter, 18, said.

We can’t believe we’re saying this, but: well done, Aaron. You seem to have reached a mature decision, following a rather impromptu decision. Other stars should follow your example and see they aren’t ready for nuptials.

Yes, we’re looking at you, Britney Spears.
